note.p: Career: Practised in Bridgewater, Somerset; devised improvements to the Newcomen engine and proposed the first steam ship, which was never built
Memberships: Extra-licentiate of the College of Physicians (1692)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Munk's Roll; Hirsch; Taylor Hanoverian
Notes: Proposed by John Theophilus Desaguliers; Dr Alexander [or Charles] Stuart; Sir Hans Sloane. Portrait at Royal College of Physicians
